loans.name: Eunice

texts.en:
Eunice is 29 years old and is married with three children. She earns her income through the sale of crops and livestock, and she receives a monthly wage as a Community Knowledge Worker (CKW). Community Knowledge Workers are trusted community members who provide agricultural data and advice to rural farmers in their local area including information about the weather, market prices, crop diseases and agricultural tools. On her land, Eunice grows beans, cassava and bananas. She also has goats and chickens.

Eunice has served as a CKW for the last two years, and she looks forward to renewing her CKW contract for the next three years.

As a CKW, she will use the materials in her business-in-a-box (smartphone, solar charging set, and weighing scale) to disseminate vital agricultural information to the other members of her village, which will help them to improve their crop yields and increase their incomes. With the additional money she will earn as a CKW, Eunice will increase her working capital in her retail business and boost her farming activities. Her biggest dream in life is to become a model farmer and a whole seller of agricultural produce with the ability to free other people in her community from poverty.

loans.use: To purchase a mobile phone, solar charging set and a weighing scale

loans.name: Augustin

texts.en: Augustin is 51 years old. He is married to a businesswoman for whom they have both six children. With the loan, he would like to buy more livestock for sale. The profits from the business will be used to pay school fees for the children.

loans.use: To buy more livestock especailly cows for sale

loans.name: Josphat

texts.en: Josphat is 44 years old and he is married with four children between the ages of three and fourteen. He lives in Nanyuki area central province of Kenya. He runs an agrovet business that sells farm inputs. He has been in the business for nine months now. He knew Milango through friends and he decided to join so that he could access funding for his business. He now seeks a loan to buy vetenary compounds, seeds and feeds for sale in the business. He hopes that in the next five years he will be running a whole sale business that will be successful one. The challenge that he faces in the business is the high cost of products which leaves him with lesser income. The extra income that he will raise from the business will improve his standards of living.

loans.use: to buy vetenary compounds, seeds and feeds

loans.name: Juliet

texts.en:
Juliet is 44 years old and is married with six children. She earns her income through the sale of crops and livestock, and she receives a monthly wage as a Community Knowledge Worker (CKW). Community Knowledge Workers are trusted community members, who provide agricultural data and advice to rural farmers in their local area including information about the weather, market prices, crop diseases and agricultural tools. On her land, Juliet grows maize, beans, coffee, vegetables and bananas. She also has cows and chickens.

Juliet has served as a CKW for the last two years, and she looks forward to renewing her CKW contract for the next three years. 

As a CKW, she will use the materials in her business-in-a-box (smartphone, solar charging set, and weighing scale) to disseminate vital agricultural information to the other members of her village, which will help them to improve their crop yields and increase their incomes. With the additional money she will earn as a CKW, Juliet will meet her family needs and pay school fees for her children. Her biggest dream in life is to become a successful self-reliant farmer in her community.

loans.use: To purchase a mobile phone, solar charging set and a weighing scale

loans.name: Jeanne

texts.en: Jeanne aged 33. She is a mother of two and she is married to a businessman. She sells various items in her boutique and has been in the business for the past five years. With the loan, she would like to buy more salt, cooking oil and soaps for sale. The profits from the business will be used to make more savings.

loans.use: To buy more salt, cooking oil and soaps for sale.

loans.name: Starehe Junction Group

texts.en:
Starehe junction group is a young group operating small scale businesses in open air markets in Eastern Kenya. They travel around different markets with different household items, clothes, shoes and farm inputs. Their target market is households with low income who have to shop in open air markets where items are cheaper. The group that comprises of 5 members has been saving with VEP for the last 6 months and has been having  very credible reputation with discipline. They have a vision of opening up a distribution stall where they can employ other youths to assist in sales  around the local markets which open different days of the week. With this in mind, they would also like to include solar lamps into their stock as one of the product that can help those at the bottom of the pyramid without access to electricity.
Samuel the group treasurer- on the far left-was the first one to buy a solar lamp from VEP during a roadshow to their region. After experiencing the changes in his fuel budget and the quality of light, he promoted the lamp to his friend in the market who agreed to form a group and get the lamps on credit for their homes. Samuel says since he bought the lamp, he has saved a lot of money previously used to buy kerosine and for mobile charging. His children also started enjoying longer study hour which has led to improved grades.  Samuel and the group would like to see other families enjoying clean, convinient lighting while at the same time they make money from the sale of those lamps
They have purchased different types of solar lamps from VEP on credit and with their sale we are confident the group will repay the loan from the profits and even take a second loan to expand the business.

loans.use: To purchase solar Lanterns for sale

loans.name: Edna

texts.en:
Edina is 57 years old and a single mother with four children. She earns her income through the sale of crops and livestock, and she receives a monthly wage as a Community Knowledge Worker (CKW). Community Knowledge Workers are trusted community members, who provide agricultural data and advice to rural farmers in their local area including information about the weather, market prices, crop diseases and agricultural tools. On her land, Edina grows maize, beans, coffee, vegetables, cabbages and bananas. She also has chickens.

Edina has served as a CKW for the last two years, and she looks forward to renewing her CKW contract for the next three years. 

As a CKW, she will use the materials in her business-in-a-box (smartphone, solar charging set, and weighing scale) to disseminate vital agricultural information to the other members of her village, which will help them to improve their crop yields and increase their incomes. With the additional money she will earn as a CKW, Edina will build a permanent house for her family and diversify her farm activities. Her biggest dream in life is a faithful service to farmers and to live a hunger free community.

loans.use: To purchase a mobile phone, solar charging set and a weighing scale

loans.name: Laurence

texts.en: Laurence is 42 years old. She is married with five children aged between five and eighteen. She has requested the loan, to buy more retail items such as soaps, salts and drinks for sale. With the profits from the business will be used to make more savings.

loans.use: To buy more salts, soaps and drinks for sale.

loans.name: Paul

texts.en:
Paul is 30 years old and is married with four children. He earns his income through the sale of crops and livestock, and he receives a monthly wage as a Community Knowledge Worker (CKW). Community Knowledge Workers are trusted community members, who provide agricultural data and advice to rural farmers in their local area including information about the weather, market prices, crop diseases and agricultural tools. On his land Paul grows beans, coffee, cassava, millet, sorghum, vegetables, and bananas. He also has cows, goats, pigs and chickens.

Paul has served as a CKW for the last two years, and he looks forward to renewing his CKW contract for the next three years. 

As a CKW, he will use the materials in his business-in-a-box (smartphone, solar charging set, and weighing scale) to disseminate vital agricultural information to the other members of his village, which will help them to improve their crop yields and increase their incomes. With the additional money he will earn as a CKW, Paul will buy more land to expand his coffee plantation to a larger scale as he currently only has one acre. His biggest dream in life is to become a model farmer and whole seller of coffee in his community

loans.use: To purchase a mobile phone, solar charging set and a weighing scale

loans.name: Marie

texts.en: Marie is 49 years old. She is married with three children. She sells various items and has been in the business for the last seven years. She sells foodstuffs and has spent seven years in the business. With the loan, she would like to buy more beans, maize and sorghum for sale. The profits from the business will be used to reinvest in the business.

loans.use: To buy more beans, maize and sorghum for sale.

loans.name: Pellumb

texts.en:
Pellumb is a 27-year-old single man who is getting married soon. He has been in the construction industry since he reached 22. He is requesting a loan for the first time because he wants to finish building off the house that you can see it in the background; the main floor will be used for his business to keep the materials and tools and the above floor will be serving the family.
The village where Pellumb lives is very high and the road is very bad, uneven and bumpy. Not very many vehicles go there, but off road vehicles or jeeps. The white vehicle parked adjacent to the house, is the one that our organization uses to reach to those location.

loans.use: to do some work at his newly built home that he will use it for business as well

loans.name: Spiro

texts.en: Spiro is back again; he wants to add inventory of materials to his store to sell.

loans.use: To stock up on construction materials for his hardware store

loans.name: Arthur

texts.en:
Arthur is 42 years old and is married with three children. He earns his income through the sale of crops and livestock, and he receives a monthly wage as a Community Knowledge Worker (CKW). Community Knowledge Workers are trusted community members, who provide agricultural data and advice to rural farmers in their local area including information about the weather, market prices, crop diseases and agricultural tools. On his land Arthur grows beans, coffee, vegetables, pineapples and bananas. He also has cows, goats and chickens.

Arthur has served as a CKW for the last two years, and he looks forward to renewing his CKW contract for the next three years. 

As a CKW, he will use the materials in his business-in-a-box (smartphone, solar charging set, and weighing scale) to disseminate vital agricultural information to the other members of his village, which will help them to improve their crop yields and increase their incomes. With the additional money he will earn as a CKW, Arthur will be able to transport his agricultural produce to the farm stores in town to sell at a higher price. His biggest dream in life is to become a successful farmer exemplary enough for other farmers to adopt improved agricultural methods

loans.use: To purchase a mobile phone, solar charging set and a weighing scale

loans.name: Jean Marie Vianney

texts.en: Jean Marie Vianney is 32 years. He is single, selling foodstuffs for the last two years.  He would like to use the new loan, to buy potatoes, beans and cassava for sale. The profits from the business will be used for making more savings.

loans.use: To buy more potatoes, beans and cassava for sale.

loans.name: Ahmet

texts.en: Ahmet wants to buy again seeds such as potato and onion for planting. He has started already preparing the soil.

loans.use: To buy seeds (potato and onion) for seasonal planting

loans.name: Claudia Marisol

texts.es:
Claudia de 29 años de edad, es una madre de familia, ella vive en unión libre con su compañero de vida, ambos trabajan. Ella se dedica al comercio informal de tamales de elote, su compañero de vida trabaja en la pesca. Por sus pocas oportunidades solamente pudo cursar hasta tercer grado, por esa razón ella se dedica a este negocio en el sector informal, Claudia es madre de dos hijos, el primero de 7 años de edad, él está cursando su educación básica a nivel del primer grado y su hermanito menor con sus tres años de edad, no asiste a la escuela por su corta edad. Esta pareja de esposos demuestran ser muy trabajadores y  manifiestan sentirse muy bendecidos por tener trabajo, consideran que el trabajo es la fuente de ingresos que les permite suplir las necesidades del hogar y a través de este van sacando a su familia adelante, gracias a ese esfuerzo es importante mencionar que la casa donde viven es propia. 

Claudia se inició en el negocio del comercio de tamales de elote, en el sector informal como la última alternativa para apoyar a su esposo, ya que las pesca es rentable por temporadas, trabajando los dos sería más sencillo sacar sus hijos adelante, como toda mujer trabajadora decidió apoyar su hogar aprendiendo un oficio que le permitiera generar ingresos para apalear la difícil situación que se hacía sentir cuando solo trabajaba su esposo, a través de los consejos de familiares y amigos ella fue acercándose a personas que se dedicaban al comercio de tamales y fue así que conoció como funcionaba este negocio, ahora ella cuenta con 3 años de experiencia en este rubro lo cual le ha permitido  ganar una cartera de clientes bastante significativa, la cual le permite mejorar sus ventas y así obtener mejores ganancias, todo esto en conjunto le permite generar los ingresos para apoyar a su compañero de vida y mantener a su familia. Ella posee un puesto en el mercado, el cual atiende de lunes a domingo en un horario de 3:00 pm a 5:00 pm, ella prepara su venta por las mañanas y luego ella se traslada de su hogar hasta su negocio en transporte público a una distancia de unos 6 kilómetros de su vivienda.

Ella está solicitando un crédito para mejorar su negocio, es decir ampliar su mercadería y ofrecer más variedad de productos a sus clientes, ella considera que con el 100% del monto del crédito puede lograr ese objetivo. Ella manifiesta que ofreciendo más variedad, ella puede mejorar sus ventas y mantener y ampliar su cartera de clientes, además convertiría su negocio en un negocio más competitivo ya que sus productos han tenido tanta aceptación que ahora trabaja también por encargos y sus ventas mejoran en días festivos. Ella esta muy motivada por poder contar con el dinero para poderlo invertir en su negocio.


A través de su experiencia en el comercio de tamales, Claudia considera que obteniendo el crédito ella puede hacer crecer su negocio diversificando sus productos  y contar con mejores ingresos para su familia. Uno de sus más grandes sueños, es sacar adelante sus hijos y convertirlos en profesionales. Además, apoyar siempre a su compañero de vida, ya que de esta manera las condiciones de vida de su familia sera mejor, con el apoyo de CREDICAMPO ella espera hacer sus sueños realidad y ser como siempre lo ha sido una mujer con ganas de trabajar y salir adelante.

loans.use: para mpliar su mercadería y ofrecer más variedad de productos a sus clientes.

loans.name: Virginia

texts.en: Virginia is a married woman. She has 1 child. She describes herself to be honest. She operates a retail business where she sells clothes. She has been involved in this business for 2 years. Her business is located in an area that is accessible and her primary customers are women. She describes her biggest business challenge to be increase in price of clothes. She will use the Kes 20,000 loan to buy stock of clothes. Her business goal is to have a wholesale within 5 years. She hopes that in the future, she will become a successful entrepreneur. This is her first loan with SMEP DTM. She will use the anticipated profits to open another boutique.

loans.use: buy stock of clothes

loans.name: Leticia

texts.en:
Leticia is 30 years old and is married with five children. She earns her income through the sale of crops and livestock, and she receives a monthly wage as a Community Knowledge Worker (CKW). Community Knowledge Workers are trusted community members, who provide agricultural data and advice to rural farmers in their local area including information about the weather, market prices, crop diseases and agricultural tools. On her land, Leticia grows maize, beans, coffee, vegetables and bananas. She also has cows, goats and chickens.

Leticia has served as a CKW for the last two years, and she looks forward to renewing her CKW contract for the next three years. 

As a CKW, she will use the materials in her business-in-a-box (smartphone, solar charging set, and weighing scale) to disseminate vital agricultural information to the other members of her village, which will help them to improve their crop yields and increase their incomes. With the additional money she will earn as a CKW, Leticia will invest in large scale farming for commercial purposes. Her biggest dream in life is to see farmers in her village move from peasantry to commercial farming through adopting improved farming practices.

loans.use: To purchase a mobile phone, solar charging set and a weighing scale

loans.name: Julius

texts.en:
Julius is 29 years old and is married with two children. He earns his income through the sale of crops and livestock, and he receives a monthly wage as a Community Knowledge Worker (CKW). Community Knowledge Workers are trusted community members, who provide agricultural data and advice to rural farmers in their local area including information about the weather, market prices, crop diseases and agricultural tools. On his land, Julius grows eggplants, beans, coffee, vegetables, passion fruits and bananas. He also has goats and chickens.

Julius has served as a CKW for the last two years, and he looks forward to renewing his CKW contract for the next three years. 

As a CKW, he will use the materials in his business-in-a-box (smartphone, solar charging set, and weighing scale) to disseminate vital agricultural information to the other members of his village, which will help them to improve their crop yields and increase their incomes. With the additional money he will earn as a CKW, Julius will meet school requirements for his children and invest in farming. His biggest dream in life is to see his fellow farmers adopt better farming methods and improve their standards of living

loans.use: To purchase a mobile phone, solar charging set and a weighing scale

loans.name: Francisco Antonio

texts.es:
Francisco de 25 años de edad, tiene un nivel académico de bachillerato general, vive junto con su mamá y dos sobrinitos de 13 y 10 años de edad, ellos estudian en nivel de secundaria y primaria siempre apoyado de la  mano de francisco; quien desarrolla  la actividad de pesca artesanal en la laguna de la comunidad.

Francisco se dedica a la pesca de mariscos en la laguna que lleva el mismo nombre de la comunidad, en la que le dedica un promedio de 8 horas laborales a dicha actividad  y lo ejerce desde hace 8 años, después que curso su nivel académico, Francisco comenzó esta actividad de la mano de un amigo quien desarrollaba dicha  actividad como negocio, fue así que Francisco se preocupó por aprender  muy bien ese rubro que le permite dar el sustento diario a su familia. 
 

Francisco está solicitando un crédito,  para la compra de un equipo de pesca, ya que  cuenta con uno muy deteriorada,  para la actividad que desarrolla, también comprara unas redes para la misma actividad, Francisco pretende que con un mejor equipo obtendrá mejores resultado en la pesca.

Francisco planea tener un negocio que le sea rentable y le permita darle una mejor oportunidad de desarrollo de su familia.

loans.use: para la compra de un equipo de pesca y unas redes para la misma actividad.

loans.name: Tugumane Group

texts.fr:
Mathias  fait partie du groupe Tugumane  et habite à Gitega. Il  52 ans et est marié  à  Perpétue  une cultivatrice. Ensemble ils ont 4 enfants  âgés de 9 à 20 ans,tous étudient.

Il fait le commerce de haricot depuis 1 an et 6 mois.

Il est à son  treizième crédit à Turame.Avec  le crédit Kiva qu’il  obtient, il va augmenter son capital et acheter  beaucoup de kilogrammes de haricot à revendre pour gagner plus.

loans.use: l va augmenter son capital et acheter  beaucoup de kilogrammes de haricot à revendre pour gagner plus.

loans.name: Caroline

texts.en:
Caroline is 29 years old and is married with three children. She earns her income through the sale of crops and livestock, and she receives a monthly wage as a Community Knowledge Worker (CKW). Community Knowledge Workers are trusted community members, who provide agricultural data and advice to rural farmers in their local area including information about the weather, market prices, crop diseases and agricultural tools. On her land, Caroline grows maize, beans, coffee, vegetables, mangoes and bananas. She also has cows, chickens and goats 

Caroline has served as a CKW for the last two years, and she looks forward to renewing her CKW contract for the next three years. 

As a CKW, she will use the materials in her business-in-a-box (smartphone, solar charging set, and weighing scale) to disseminate vital agricultural information to the other members of her village, which will help them to improve their crop yields and increase their incomes. With the additional money she will earn as a CKW, Caroline will buy more birds to boost her poultry project for more produce. Her biggest dream in life is to become a model farmer able to free fellow farmers from poverty.

loans.use: To purchase a mobile phone, solar charging set and a weighing scale

loans.name: Meryem

texts.en:
Meryem has sewn trousseau items for a living for 30 years.  She now has a store after working from home for many years.  In this way she raised two children and was able to send them to university, says Meryem, who is not afraid of difficulties and doesn’t give up.  Even when she had health problems, she didn’t stop working and says women must earn money to be strong.  “I have to be a strong mother, so I have to earn money,” she said.  She’ll use the loan to buy goods and materials for her store and in the future she plans to earn enough money to be able to help women in difficult situations.
Translated from Turkish by Maya Staff 
Meryem Hanım çeyiz malzemeleri dikerek geçimini sağlıyor 30 yıldır.  Uzun yıllar boyunca evden yaptığı içi için artık bir dükkanı var.  İki çocuğunu bu sayede yetiştirip üniversite okutabildiğini söyleyen Meryem Hanım’ın zorluklardan yılmayan ve vazgeçmeyen güçlü bir yapısı var.  Sağlık problemleri yaşadığı donemde bile çalışmaktan hiç vazgeçmemiş ve kadınların guclu olmak ıcın para kazanmasının şart olduğunu soyluyor.  Ben guclu bır anne olmak zorundaydım ve bu yuzden para kazanmam gerekıyordu dıyor.  Mikro krediyle dukanı ıcın mal malzeme aldı ve ileride zor durumdakı kadınlara yardım edebılecek kadar para kazanmayı planlıyor.

loans.use: buy goods and materials

loans.name: Vildan

texts.en:
Vildan has been a tailor for 22 years.  She encountered a number of difficulties.  Sometimes she was very worn out, but she didn’t give up.  Vildan paid the school expenses of her two grown children, and in order to be a standing and productive mother she never gave up working.  In time, she began saving to expand and be able to train other women to sew.  When she learned about Maya she was very happy. She aims to buy goods and materials for her store and hire workers to expand.
Translated from Turkish by Maya Staff 
Vildan hanım 22 yıldır terzilik yapıyor.  Bu sure ıcınde turlu zorluklarla karşılaştığını, zaman zaman cok yoruldugunu ama asla vazgecmedıgını soyluyor.  Şu an iki yetişkin çocuğu olan Vildan Hanım onların okul masraflarının yanı sıra hayata karşı dik duran ve üreten bir anne olmak için çalışmaktan hiç vazgeçmemiş.  Zaman içinde kendini geliştirmiş ve diğer kadınlara dikiş hocalığı yapabilecek birikime ulaşmış.  Maya ile tanıştığı için çok mutlu.  Dükkanına mal ve malzeme alıyor ve yanında işçi  çalıştırabilecek kadar buyumeyi hedefliyor.

loans.use: to buy goods and materials

loans.name: Aybegün

texts.en:
Aybegün sews women’s clothing.  Responsible for looking after her family, Aybegün was determined to succeed as she began work with a single sewing machine.  She thought no one would support her.  When she learned about Maya, she was able to buy a very important industrial iron.  With her second loan she bought cloth and thread. She thought her life was a series of difficulties.  She knows being a woman is already difficult, and for a woman who has to earn money without support working is more difficult.  She wants Maya to gain strength and extend its services, providing steady support.  In the future, she also wants to help women who need support.
Translated from Turkish by Maya Staff 
Aybegün Hanım kadın kıyafetleri dikiyor.  Ailesine bakmakla yukumlu olan Aybegün hanım tek bir makinayla başladığı esnaflıkta başarılı olmakta kararlı.  Bu çabalarında kendısıne kımsenın destek olmadığını dusunurken Maya ile tanıştığını ve işi için cok onemlı olan sanayi tipi ütüyü alabildiğini soyluyor.  2. Kredisiyle de toplan kumaş  ve iplik alarak kazançlı bir alışveriş yaptığını belırtıyor.  Hayatının mucadeleden ıbaret oldugunu dusuyor.  Kadın olmak zaten zorken desteği olmayan ve para kazanmak zorunda olan bir kadının işinin daha zor olduğunu biliyor.  Maya sayesinde guclenmek ve yere sağlam basmak istiyor.  İlerde kendısı de destege ıhtıyacı olan kadınlara fayda sağlamak istiyor.

loans.use: to buy cloth and thread

loans.name: Semra

texts.en:
Semra successfully became an artisan despite many difficulties, lack of support from her family and having small children.  She produces decorations and trousseau items using a technique rarely done in her city.  The products she makes are all specialised hand work.  Semra experienced very hard conditions and obstacles were always in her way but rather than demoralize her, they motivated her.  Striving to stay on her feet for long periods, Semra’s hard work and ingenuity earned her a place on the market with larger and older artisans.  When she first learned about Maya, she bought goods and materials to expand her selection.  With her second loan, she bought a computer and began to show her products on the internet, reaching more people.  Her goal is to gather women like herself, who face difficult conditions, under one roof and provide them opportunities.
Translated from Turkish by Maya Staff 
Semra Hanım tum zorluklara, ailesinden destek gormemesine ve kucuk cocuğuna rağmen esnaf olmayı başarmış bir kadın.  Bulunduğu şehirde çok kullanılmayan bir teknikle ozel gunler için süslemeler ve çeyiz malzemeleri üretiyor.  Urettiği ürünlerin hepsi ozel el yapımı.  Semra Hanım çok zor şartlarda yaşadığını, onune sureklı engeller cıktıgını ancak bu durumun onu yıldırmak yerıne aksine daha çok motive ettiğini soyluyor.  Buyuk ve eski esnafların içinde uzun sure ayakta durma mucadelesi veren Semra Hanım çalışkanlığı ve yaratıcılığı sayesinde piyasada nihayet yer edinebilmiş.  Maya ile ilk tanışmasında mal ve malzeme alarak ürün çeşitliliğini artırırken 2. Kredisiyle bilgisayar alarak yaptığı ürünleri internette sergilemeyi ve bu sayede daha cok kişiye ulaşmayı başardı.  Hedefinde kendisi gibi zor şartlarda olan urtici kadınlara bir çatı altında toplamak ve onlara iş imkanı sağlamak var.

loans.use: to buy computer

loans.name: Alivera

texts.en: Alivera is 44 years old. She is married to a teacher. She sells foodstuffs and has been in the business for the past 12 years. With the loan, she wants to buy more maize and beans for sale. The profits from the business will be used to reinvest in the business, she would love to have a depot in the future.

loans.use: To buy more maize beans for sale.

loans.name: Fatuma

texts.en:
Fatuma is 48 years old and is married with six children. She earns her income through the sale of crops and livestock, and she receives a monthly wage as a Community Knowledge Worker (CKW). Community Knowledge Workers are trusted community members, who provide agricultural data and advice to rural farmers in their local area including information about the weather, market prices, crop diseases and agricultural tools. On her land, Fatuma grows maize, beans, coffee, vegetables and bananas. She also has cows, goats and chickens.

Fatuma has served as a CKW for the last two years, and she looks forward to renewing her CKW contract for the next three years. 

As a CKW, she will use the materials in her business-in-a-box (smartphone, solar charging set, and weighing scale) to disseminate vital agricultural information to the other members of her village, which will help them to improve their crop yields and increase their incomes. With the additional money she will earn as a CKW, Fatuma will meet school fees requirements for her children and invest in farming. Her biggest dream in life is to become the leading commercial farmer in her community and help other farmers shift from peasantry to commercial farming.

loans.use: To purchase a mobile phone, solar charging set and a weighing scale

loans.name: John

texts.en:
John aged 62 years old a resident of Kenga in Kibaale district is married and has 12 children aged between 35 and 14, only 3 are in school but he also stays with 3 dependants who are orphans.
John has approached Ugafode for a loan of UGX.1,500,000= to complete his house and he intends to pay back using proceeds from his market tendering business.His dream is to see all his children complete school and supporting themselves.
In his business according to him he is mainly challenged by seasonality and bad weather that sometimes affects the operations of the market.
John describes himself as hardworking family man who loves his family.

loans.use: To complete his house

loans.name: Joseph

texts.en:
Joseph is 23 years old and is married with no child yet. He earns his income through the sale of crops and livestock, and he receives a monthly wage as a Community Knowledge Worker (CKW). Community Knowledge Workers are trusted community members, who provide agricultural data and advice to rural farmers in their local area including information about the weather, market prices, crop diseases and agricultural tools. On his land, Joseph grows maize, beans, coffee, vegetables, cassava, sweet potatoes and bananas. He also has fish, goats and chickens.

Joseph has served as a CKW for the last two years, and he looks forward to renewing his CKW contract for the next three years. 

As a CKW, he will use the materials in his business-in-a-box (smartphone, solar charging set, and weighing scale) to disseminate vital agricultural information to the other members of his village, which will help them to improve their crop yields and increase their incomes. With the additional money he will earn as a CKW, Joseph will increase his savings to invest in large scale production. His biggest dream in life is to see his community adopt better farming practices and take farming as a business.

loans.use: To purchase a mobile phone, solar charging set and a weighing scale

loans.name: Miguel Antonio

texts.es:
Miguel de 33 años de edad, por sus pocas oportunidades solamente pudo cursar hasta segundo grado, por esa razón él se dedica a la carnicería, distribuye carne de res y de cerdo y una pequeña parte de la mercadería la comercializa en su comunidad. Además, él es el proveedor de carne para el negocio que tiene su madre, en un puesto del mercado. Él vive en unión libre con su compañera de vida, son padres de dos hijos, el primero tiene 5 años de edad, que no asiste a la escuela por su corta edad y su hermanito menor tiene 3 años de edad y de igual manera tampoco asiste a la escuela.  La compañera de vida de Miguel le ayuda en el negocio de la carnicería, lo cual le permite obtener mayores ganancias. 

Miguel ha practicado la agricultura toda su vida, ya que su padre le enseño el trabajo de campo, se inició en el negocio de la carnicería hace 5 años, lo cual le permitió generar su cartera de clientes y obtener dinero extra para los gastos del hogar,  él está buscando la manera de sacar sus hijos adelante, ya que la situación no esta sencilla, con relación a la economía nacional, como todo hombre trabajador está saliendo adelante con su negocio de carnicería. A través, de los consejos de familiares y amigos él ha pensado ampliar su negocio y proveer con más producto a sus clientes, siempre pensando en satisfacer la demanda de sus clientes, quienes depositan su confianza sobre los productos que él comercializa. Su negocio, se realiza en su casa de habitación y esta actividad la realiza dos o tres veces por semana y lo atiende los días, lunes, miércoles y sábados  un horario de 4:00 am a 9:00 am, él se traslada de su hogar hasta donde están sus clientes en vehículo propio, dichos puestos le quedan a más o menos 20 kilómetros de su vivienda.

El esta solicitando un crédito para comprar cerdos y ganado para destazarlos.

A través de su experiencia en el comercio de carne, Miguel considera que obteniendo el crédito él puede hacer crecer su negocio diversificando sus productos  y contar con mejores ingresos para su familia. Uno de sus más grandes sueños es sacar adelante sus hijos y convertirlos en profesionales.

loans.use: para comprar cerdos y ganado para destazarlos.

loans.name: Haziz

texts.en:
Haziz wants to buy water pipes, peach seedling for planting and also do some service to some sort of water tank he currently has with a loan of 200,000 Albanian Lek that he is requesting from Kiva lenders. He has been doing agriculture for the past twenty years, mostly planting, harvesting and selling fresh veggies and peach and grape fruits to the farmers’ market of their nearby town. Sometimes he produces in quantities and sells the products to the wholesalers/buyers. 
Haziz is in his fifties; is married and has three children; his parents live with him as well and this is according to the Albanian culture.

loans.use: to buy peach seedlings, water pipes and ....

loans.name: Francis

texts.en: Francis is a married man. He describes himself to be creative and self driven. He operates a retail business where he sells drinks ,books and other items. He also operates M-pesa business( mobile phone based money transfer service). He describes family challenge to be poor drainage in the area they live. He will use the Kes 120,000 loan to buy a water storage facility and add stock of drinks , books, add M-pesa float and other items he sells in his business. This will enable him have enough stock to sell to customers hence increasing his income. The water storage facility will enable her family store clean water for domestic use. This is his third loan with SMEP DTM. Previous loan of KES 80,000 was repaid successfully.

loans.use: buy a water storage facility and add stock of drinks , books, add M-pesa float and other items

loans.name: Julian

texts.en:
Julian is 26 years old and is still single with no children yet. She earns her income through the sale of crops and livestock, and she receives a monthly wage as a Community Knowledge Worker (CKW). Community Knowledge Workers are trusted community members, who provide agricultural data and advice to rural farmers in their local area including information about the weather, market prices, crop diseases and agricultural tools. On her land, Julian grows maize, beans, vegetables and bananas. She also has cows and chickens.

Julian has served as a CKW for the last two years, and she looks forward to renewing her CKW contract for the next three years.

As a CKW, she will use the materials in her business-in-a-box (smartphone, solar charging set, and weighing scale) to disseminate vital agricultural information to the other members of her village, which will help them to improve their crop yields and increase their incomes. With the additional money she will earn as a CKW, Julian will grow a wider range of crops as she currently grows only four crops. Her biggest dream in life is to become a model farmer and help other farmers adopt better agricultural methods.

loans.use: To purchase a mobile phone, solar charging set and a weighing scale

loans.name: Expedito

texts.en:
Expedito aged 31 years old, a driver on Kagadi Kampala road, he is not married and has no children.
Besides being in public transport, he is involved in buying and selling of agricultural produce such as  maize and ground nuts.
He has approached Ugafode for a loan of UGX.3,000,000= to invest in his business of produce so that he can earn more profits,this being harvest season, the produce is cheap.
He dreams of having as a family which he can maintain very well and also complete his house that is located in Kagadi town.
He describes himself as a hardworking person who is honest and also indicates that his main challenge is competition and seasonality of the business he is involved in.

loans.use: To buy agricultural produce

loans.name: Livine

texts.en: Livine is 36 years old. She is married with two children. With the loan, she would like to buy more beans and maize for sale. With the profits from the business will be used to make more savings.

loans.use: To buy more beans and maize for sale.

loans.name: Peace

texts.en:
Peace is 26 years old and is married with two children. She earns her income through the sale of crops and livestock, and she receives a monthly wage as a Community Knowledge Worker (CKW). Community Knowledge Workers are trusted community members, who provide agricultural data and advice to rural farmers in their local area including information about the weather, market prices, crop diseases and agricultural tools. On her land, Peace grows Irish potatoes, beans, vegetables and bananas. She also has goats and chickens.

Peace has served as a CKW for the last two years, and she looks forward to renewing her CKW contract for the next three years. 

As a CKW, she will use the materials in her business-in-a-box (smartphone, solar charging set, and weighing scale) to disseminate vital agricultural information to the other members of her village, which will help them to improve their crop yields and increase their incomes. With the additional money she will earn as a CKW, Peace will meet school requirements for her children and invest in vegetables. Her biggest dream in life is to become a model farmer and successful business woman in her community.

loans.use: To purchase a mobile phone, solar charging set and a weighing scale

loans.name: Mariano Antonio

texts.es:
Mariano de 64 años de edad, estudio hasta primer ciclo de básica, por la situación económica que pasaba su familia no logro seguir estudiando. Él es casado su esposa se dedica a los oficios domésticos en su hogar, actualmente en su vivienda viven sus 5 personas su esposa y 3 hijos que actualmente se encuentran estudiando y que en los momentos libres le ayudan en los trabajos agrícolas y que son las únicas personas que dependen de él.  

Mariano se dedica a la agricultura en la siembra de granos básicos (maíz, frijol), desde que él estaba pequeño sus padres le inculcaron a aprender este trabajo como era la única alternativa de trabajo y de ingresos en aquellos  tiempos, por eso se dedicaba a la agricultura. Aparte de dedicarse a la agricultura también se dedica a la ganadería en la compra y venta de  ganado, que es otra actividad que le genera ingresos económicos para su familia. Para llegar a su lugar de trabajo, tiene que caminar 30 minutos a pie que también recibe el apoyo de sus hijos y esposa para realizar los trabajos agrícolas.

   El préstamo que está solicitando, es para comprar insumos agrícolas  y recolección de granos básicos (maíz, frijol), el préstamo le ayudara a poder recolectar los frutos más adecuadamente y eficientemente en el tiempo específico, sin mayores complicaciones de perdida.

Mariano  desea para el futuro tener una mejor calidad de vida para él y su familia  y obtener  mayor  producción de granos básicos y vivir cómodamente en un lugar digno para sus hijos y que sus hijos sigan estudiando para que en el futuro sean  personas profesionales y logren terminar su estudios y sacar  una carrera universitaria todo esto lo lograra con mucho esfuerzo y dedicación con su  esposa y mucho trabajo y por supuesto con futuros prestamos que sacara.

loans.use: para comprar insumos agrícolas  y recolección de granos básicos (maíz, frijol).

loans.name: Elizabeth

texts.es:
Elizabeth tiene 43 años, es madre soltera de 2 hijas que viven junto a ella en su vivienda hecha a base de material noble. Elizabeth alquila un espacio en su vivienda pero tambien se dedica a la venta de repuestos para vehículos menores como motos y mototaxis en un establecimiento que tiene como propietaria a su hermana siendo su principal oficio. Anteriormente se poseía un negocio dedicado al pelado de arroz que puso con apoyo de su ex esposo el cual le sirvió para obtener ingresos sólidos y cumplir con la construcción de su vivienda  a base de material noble.Uno de sus principales objetivos es poner su propia tienda de repuestos a largo plazo.  Este es su segundo préstamo con Kiva y se siente agradecida por el apoyo financiero que recibe para seguir adelante, además se compromete a pagar sus cuotas de manera puntual.
Desea en esta oportunidad contar con 2,000 nuevos soles para la compra de pinturas y contrata de personal para el pintado y mejorado de su local que desea poner en alquiler.

loans.use: Compra de pinturas y contrato a personal.

loans.name: Eugenie

texts.en: Eugenie is 50 years old. She is married with two children. With the loan, she wants to buy more beans and sorghum for sale. With the profits from the business will be used to reinvest in the business.

loans.use: To buy more beans and sorghum for sale.

loans.name: Orlando Jose

texts.es: Orlando tiene 28 años de edad, originario de la ciudad de León, Soltero y estudiante de una universidad de la ciudad de León. A pesar de su nivel económico ha salido adelante con mucho esfuerzo y dedicación asi como ha cumplido sus metas propuestas. Sus deseos de prosperar lo motivaron a trabajar y estudiar al mismo tiempo para pagar sus estudios, y se siente orgulloso de lo que ha logrado hasta el momento. Su familia lo apoya en gran manera. Solicita el crédito para suplir todos los gastos de su graduación. Su plan futuro es conseguir un trabajo en el que pueda obtener mejores ingresos y así contribuir con su familia y su comunidad.

loans.use: Para suplir todos los gastos de su graduación.

loans.name: Superior

texts.en:
Superior is 26 years old and is married with two children. She earns her income through the sale of crops and livestock, and she receives a monthly wage as a Community Knowledge Worker (CKW). Community Knowledge Workers are trusted community members, who provide agricultural data and advice to rural farmers in their local area including information about the weather, market prices, crop diseases and agricultural tools. On her land, Superior grows beans, coffee, vegetables, cassava Irish potatoes, sweet potatoes and bananas. She also has pigs and chickens.

Superior has served as a CKW for the last two years, and she looks forward to renewing her CKW contract for the next three years. 

As a CKW, she will use the materials in her business-in-a-box (smartphone, solar charging set, and weighing scale) to disseminate vital agricultural information to the other members of her village, which will help them to improve their crop yields and increase their incomes. With the additional money she will earn as a CKW, Superior will start a retail business in her community to supplement her earnings from the sale of agricultural produce. Her biggest dream in life is to become a model farmer with enough food security and able to meet the needs of her family.

loans.use: To purchase a mobile phone, solar charging set and a weighing scale

loans.name: Aysel

texts.en:
Aysel has sewn bridal gowns for 35 years.  Her husband is a retired laborer and she has three children, one who attends university.  She is proud to be a strong woman and earn money.  “My greatest achievement is my children going to school,” she said.  She uses part of her house as a sewing area.  She has two daughters who haven’t reached university age yet, so she has to work more, she says.  Her goal is to open a fine sewing workshop and see her daughters finish university.  She’ll use the loan to buy goods and materials.  A very positive and hardworking woman, Aysel says she won’t stop working to keep her daughters from experiencing the difficulties she did.
Translated from Turkish by Maya Staff 
Aysel Hanım 35 yıldır gelinlik dikiyor.  Eşi işçi emeklisi olan Aysel Hanımın biri üniversiteye giden üç çocuğu var.  Bir kadın olarak guclu olmaktan ve para kazanıyor olmaktan gurur duyuyor.  En buyuk eserim okula giden cocuklarım dıyor.  Evinin bir bölümünü dikiş alanı olarak kullanıyor.  Daha üniversite çağına gelmemiş iki tane kızı olduğunu ve bu nedenle daha çok çalışması gerektiğini soyluyor.  Hedefinde guzel bir dikiş atolyesı acmak ve kızlarının da unıversıte dıplomalarını gormek var.  Maya'dan alacağı kredi ile mal ve malzeme alacak.  Kendi yaşadığı zorlukları kızlarının yaşamaması için mucadeleyı bırakmayacagını  belırten Aysel Hanım cok olumlu ve çalışkan bir kadın.

loans.use: to buy goods and materials

loans.name: Sharot

texts.en:
Sharot is 25 years old and is married with three children. She earns her income through the sale of crops and livestock, and she receives a monthly wage as a Community Knowledge Worker (CKW). Community Knowledge Workers are trusted community members, who provide agricultural data and advice to rural farmers in their local area including information about the weather, market prices, crop diseases and agricultural tools. On her land, Sharot grows beans, coffee, vegetables and bananas. She also has goats and chickens.

Sharot has served as a CKW for the last two years, and she looks forward to renewing her CKW contract for the next three years. 

As a CKW, she will use the materials in her business-in-a-box (smartphone, solar charging set, and weighing scale) to disseminate vital agricultural information to the other members of her village, which will help them to improve their crop yields and increase their incomes. With the additional money she will earn as a CKW, Sharot will meet school requirements for her children and save for agricultural expansion. Her biggest dream in life is to see her community members effectively use their savings earned from the sale of agricultural produce to improve their livelihoods.

loans.use: To purchase a mobile phone, solar charging set and a weighing scale

loans.name: Gloria

texts.es: Gloria tiene 34 años, está casada con Juan y tiene 3 hijos que viven junto a ella en su casa hecha de madera. Gloria tiene un pequeño salon de belleza ya que al igual que su esposo tiene conocimiento de corte de pelo a damas y caballeros. Hace 5 años que se dedica a esta labor y considera que le ayuda a mantener la economía de su hogar en buen estado. Para obtener algunas ganancias adicionales decidió comprar una refrigeradora para iniciarse en la venta de refresco y chupetes hechos a base de  frutas regionales para llamar la atención de sus clientes ganando buena aceptación entre sus vecinos y transeuntes que circulan por su zona. Lo que mas le agrada es que puede obtener ingresos para solventar los gastos de su familia estando en casa y al pendiente de sus hijos ya que son aún pequeños y trata de apoyarlos siempre. Uno de sus principales objetivos a largo plazo es edificar su vivienda  con ladrillos y cemento esperando así mejorar su calidad de vida familiar. En esta ocasión desea contar con 2,000 soles y realizar mejoras en la infraestructura de su negocio como el cambio de paredes de madera y reparaciones en el techo del mismo.

loans.use: Compra de madera para reparar su local.

loans.name: Clementine

texts.en: Clementine is 27 years old. She is married with two children. She has been in the business for the past three years. With the loan, she would like to buy more beans, sorghum and maize for sale. With the profits from the business will be used to make more savings.

loans.use: To buy more beans, sorghum and maize for sale.

loans.name: Posiano

texts.en:
Posiano is 42 years old and is married with five children. He earns his income through the sale of crops and livestock, and he receives a monthly wage as a Community Knowledge Worker (CKW). Community Knowledge Workers are trusted community members, who provide agricultural data and advice to rural farmers in their local area including information about the weather, market prices, crop diseases and agricultural tools. On his land, Posiano grows maize, beans, coffee, sweet potatoes, cassava and bananas. He also has cows, goats and chickens.

Posiano has served as a CKW for the last two years, and he looks forward to renewing his CKW contract for the next three years. 

As a CKW, he will use the materials in his business-in-a-box (smartphone, solar charging set, and weighing scale) to disseminate vital agricultural information to the other members of his village, which will help them to improve their crop yields and increase their incomes. With the additional money he will earn as a CKW, Posiano will meet school requirements for his children and educate them up to the university. His biggest dream in life is to become a successful business man and advise farmers on better yet cost-effective farming practices

loans.use: To purchase a mobile phone, solar charging set and a weighing scale

loans.name: María De Los Ángeles

texts.es:
María de los Ángeles, es originaria del municipio de El Sauce, es madre de cuatro hijos, se desempeña como conserje en el hospital de la localidad desde hace más de veinte años.
A pesar de ser una labor difícil y de ganar tan poco lo hace con dedicación porque gracias a este empleo le permite llevar el pan de cada día a su hogar y sacar adelante a sus hijos.
Es una labor difícil porque debido a la naturaleza del trabajo tiene que hacer turnos de noche para realizar la limpieza, sin embargo ha salido adelante con lo poco que gana siendo una persona de escasos recursos ha tratado de darle lo mejor que ha podido a sus hijos.
María se presentó a la oficina de Ceprodel para solicitar a los inversionistas de Kiva un crédito para pagar el título universitario de su carrera como profesional, ya que a punta de esfuerzo se preparó como Licenciada en Tecnología Médica.
Espera y confía en Dios que su crédito sea aprobado para llevar a cabo su inversión.

loans.use: Pago de título universitario

loans.name: Solange

texts.en: Solange is 28 years old. She is married with three children. She sells various merchandise in her boutique. With the loan, she would like to buy more soap, cooking oil, lotions and some foodstuffs for sale. She plans to use the profits for making more savings.

loans.use: To buy more soaps, cooking oil and lotions for sale.

loans.name: Maria

texts.es:
Maria es soltera, tiene dos hijos, vive en una casa donde paga mensualmente (en alquiler)la misma se encuentra ubicada en la zona de Tahuantinsuyo de la ciudad de El Alto.
Ella estudio solo hasta el nivel secundaria; tiene su Salon de Belleza donde atiende diariamente, ofreciendo los servicios de corte, permanente y peinados. El Salón está ubicado en la misma zona  en la ciudad de El Alto.
El crédito lo requiere para la compra de diferentes productos como ser tintes, spray y otros insumos que necesita para su salón. 
El sueño de Maria  es tener su salon con todas las comodidades para poder ofrecer a sus clientes   y tener mejores ingresos  mejor calidad de vida.
Es la segunda  vez que solicita crédito junto a IMPRO y la primera vez con KIVA.

loans.use: compra de tintes, sprays y otros insumos que se requieren para su salón de belleza.

loans.name: Chantal

texts.en: Chantal is 22 years old. She has one child aged 2. She sells various items in her business. With the loan, she would like to buy more cooking oil and sugar for sale. With the profits from the business will be used to reinvest more in the business. She is very successful in her previous loan because she bought livestock from the profits after reinvested some money in her existing business.

loans.use: To buy more cooking oil, sugar, and jugs for resale.

loans.name: Maria Eulalia

texts.es:
María, es casada, vive con su familia compuesta por su esposo y su hijo de 6 años, ella con el fin de apoyar en los gastos familiares inicio una venta de cosméticos, sus actividades inician de 6: 00 a.m. a 5:00 p.m., para ella no es una actividad difícil de realizar y no representa algún riesgo.
Invertirá el capital en la compra de labiales, esmaltes, maquillaje, rubores, entre otros productos como cremas y lociones para surtir el inventario de su negocio y tener nuevos clientes, espera mejorar sus ingresos para continuar dando su aportación a su familia y cancelar la deuda adquirida.
Aspira a tener un negocio con variedad de productos para así tener más clientes y mejorar su vida familiar.

loans.use: compra de labiales, esmaltes, maquillaje, rubores,

loans.name: Las Ñustas Group

texts.es:
Los socios pertenecen al banco comunal “LAS ÑUSTAS”; Este banco se ubicada en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Graciela ella es casada y tiene 36 años; La socia trabaja en su negocio de venta de verduras y frutas, la socia vende manzanas,naranjas,uvas,platanos y mandarinas, la socia también vende zanahorias, tomates y pepinos, la socia tiene un puesto de mercado donde vende las frutas y verduras, la socia trabaja desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 5:00 p.m,la socia ya tiene 7 años en este negocio y le va muy bien, el sueño de la socia es tener un local donde pueda vender las frutas y verduras. La socia solicita el crédito para comprar naranjas, plátanos, uvas, cebollas, zanahorias y pepinos.
 
 
 
Los otros socios se dedican al negocio de venta de animales, negocio de venta de carne, negocio de tienda de abarrotes y negocio de venta de comida.


La socia agradece a quienes forman parte de este sueño mediante este medio y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.

loans.use: La socia solicita el crédito para comprar naranjas, plátanos, uvas, cebollas, zanahorias y pepinos.

loans.name: Ronald

texts.en:
Ronald is 30 years old and is married with five children. He earns his income through the sale of crops and livestock, and he receives a monthly wage as a Community Knowledge Worker (CKW). Community Knowledge Workers are trusted community members, who provide agricultural data and advice to rural farmers in their local area including information about the weather, market prices, crop diseases and agricultural tools. On his land, Ronald grows maize, beans, coffee, vegetables, cassava and bananas. He also has cows, pigs and chickens.

Ronald has served as a CKW for the last two years, and he looks forward to renewing his CKW contract for the next three years. 

As a CKW, he will use the materials in his business-in-a-box (smartphone, solar charging set, and weighing scale) to disseminate vital agricultural information to the other members of his village, which will help them to improve their crop yields and increase their incomes. With the additional money he will earn as a CKW, Ronald will buy school requirements for his children and invest in poultry keeping. His biggest dream in life is to become a successful business man and see farmers in his community embrace farming as a business to improve their livelihoods.

loans.use: To purchase a mobile phone, solar charging set and a weighing scale

loans.name: Roberto Antonio

texts.es:
Roberto de 34 años de edad,  estudio hasta noveno grado ya que por la falta de recursos económicos,  tuvo que dedicarse a trabajar él le ayudaba a un vecino a vender frutas y verduras;  luego puso una venta de CD’s y también él era el encargado de vender. Roberto  está soltero, hace años estuvo acompañado y tiene dos hijos los cuales viven con la mamá y están estudiando pero siempre está al pendiente que a ellos no les falte nada.

En la venta de CD’s y películas tiene una experiencia de 4 años,  administra su negocio pero tiene otras ventas en las cuales tiene a personas trabajando de esta manera,  pasa la vida.  él sabe mucho de este oficio, ya que desde que era pequeño se dedicó a ayudarle a su vecino en la venta y al ver que este negocio le producía ganancias decidió dedicarse. También antes de trabajar como comerciante,  trabajaba como motorista dicho trabajo aun lo realiza periódicamente, su negocio lo tiene en el centro de la ciudad, pero para verificar el manejo de los otros que tiene en otros municipios tiene que trasladarse en autobús. 

Con el crédito comprara más  CD´S y películas para surtir sus negocios de una sola vez, generándole un ahorro en la compra ya que al comprar en masa una cantidad grande le sale más barato por unidad y así el tendrá más para invertir y que sus negocios de CD’s estén con la variedad que él espera y le generen más rentabilidad.
En un futuro  desea comprar su vehículo,  para trasladarse a sus negocio y así estar más de cerca en ellos también desea abrir una venta de ropa, donde podrá obtener mejores ingresos, él quiere estabilizar su vida buscarse una pareja con la cual puedan tener hijos y crecerlos juntos que vivan sanamente y aprendan un oficio con el cual ellos puedan desempeñarse a lo largo de su vida.

loans.use: para comprar CD´S y películas para surtir sus negocios de una sola vez.

loans.name: Edith Elizabeth

texts.es:
Edith, es madre de dos hijos de 8 y 12 años de edad, ella es casada, se dedica a vender ropa y tambien vende en ocaiones panes con pollo, lo aprendió por iniciativa propia, lo realiza de 8:00 a.m. a 4:00 p.m., no posee ayuda del extranjero, por el momento no ha tenido problemas en tener este tipo de negocio.
Comprará pantalones, faldas, blusas, camisas, y trajes para niños, con  lo que piensa mejorar la variedad de productos para satisfacer a sus clientes, espera tener un negocio más rentable que le de los ingresos necesarios para cubrir sus gastos y cancelar las cuotas del crédito.
Sueña con equipar su casa con electrodomésticos necesarios para mejorar el estilo familiar así como también hacer mejoras a su vivienda.

loans.use: Comprará pantalones, faldas, blusas, camisas, y trajes para niños

loans.name: Jose Raul

texts.es: José Raúl, es una persona muy dedicada y se esfuerza para dar lo mejor en su labor que desempeña en el área de dirección en un recinto universitario, ubicado en un departamento de Managua, es Lic. en administración de empresas  y desea continuar aprendiendo, pues hoy en día estudia una maestría en educación superior el cual tiene un costo muy alto comparado a su salario mensual con lo que mantiene a su esposa e hijos, es por eso que solicita el crédito para poder pagar este curso tan importante para su desarrollo profesional.

loans.use: Para pagar curso de maestria.

loans.name: Martha

texts.es: Martha tiene 33, está casada con Juan y tiene 3 hijos con quienes vive en su vivienda propia hecha a base de madera. Martha tiene un negocio dedicado a la venta de repuestos para vehículos medianos además de un taller que esta a cargo de su esposo en donde  se realiza servicio técnico preventivo y correctivo de motores. Comenta que el hecho de trabajar junto a su esposo hace que su unión sea más fuerte haciendo de su trabajo uno de los mejores que ella haya tenido. Al notar el incremento del parque automotor en su localidad ella requiere contar con una amplia  gama de repuestos así como la de lubricantes comerciales, es por ello que debe disponer de capital suficiente el cual le permita tener siempre lo necesario. Es el segundo préstamo que solicita a Kiva y se siente agradecida por el apoyo financiero que recibe para seguir adelante, además se compromete a pagar sus cuotas de manera puntual. En esta oportunidad desea contar con 2,000 nuevos soles para la compra de lubricantes al por mayor así como de repuestos menores.

loans.use: Compra de repuestos y lubricantes para vehículos.

loans.name: Leydi Noemy

texts.es:
Leydi, estudio hasta bachillerato opción contador, tiene una hija de tres años y está casada su esposo se dedica a trabajar en la agricultura y en esta temporada se dedica a la corta de café en la finca,  son una familia muy unida y trabajadora ya que mientras él pasa en el trabajo ella se dedica a los oficios del hogar a cuidar a su hija y a atender una pequeña tienda que poseen.

La tienda es atendida directamente por ella, ya que en busca de llevar un ingreso extra a su familia ella decidió abrir su negocio el cual le genera un buen ingreso; pero por la zona en donde ella vive no puede tener la tienda en su casa así que tiene que caminar durante 15 minutos hasta donde tiene el negocio todos los días y estar pendiente del cuido de su hija y de la llegada de su esposo para atenderlo.

Con el crédito comprara más mercadería para surtir tienda, ya que por ahorita no tiene mucha mercadería con la compra de todos estos productos obtendrá más ingresos diarios y tendrá mas ganancia ya que comprando un volumen más alto de mercadería será a un precio más bajo,  así como en el transporte se ahorrara ya que tiene que ir a la ciudad a comprar y como el transporte para su comunidad es escaso ella tiene que pagar un vehículo para llevar su mercadería.

En un futuro ella quiere ver a su hija crecer en un mundo donde ella sea una persona de bien en su comunidad, trabajadora y que estudie una carrera universitaria, también ella quiere que su pequeña tienda crezca más y al final sea muy grande donde pueda tener más ingresos para que su condición de vida cambie.

loans.use: para comprar productos para surtir la tienda, ya que por ahorita no tiene mucha mercadería

loans.name: Ruth

texts.en:
Ruth is 28 years old and is married with two children. She earns her income through the sale of crops and livestock, and she receives a monthly wage as a Community Knowledge Worker (CKW). Community Knowledge Workers are trusted community members, who provide agricultural data and advice to rural farmers in their local area including information about the weather, market prices, crop diseases and agricultural tools. On her land Ruth grows maize, beans, coffee, vegetables, cassava and bananas. She also has pigs, goats and chickens.

Ruth has served as a CKW for the last two years, and she looks forward to renewing her CKW contract for the next three years.

As a CKW, she will use the materials in her business-in-a-box (smartphone, solar charging set, and weighing scale) to disseminate vital agricultural information to the other members of her village, which will help them to improve their crop yields and increase their incomes. With the additional money she will earn as a CKW, Ruth will meet school requirements for her children and set up demonstration gardens to act as learning centres for farmers. Her biggest dream in life is to become a successful commercial farmer and see other farmers adopt improved agricultural practices.

loans.use: To purchase a mobile phone, solar charging set and a weighing scale

loans.name: Maria Del Carmen

texts.es:
María,  es madre de una niña de 6 años, ella es soltera, para poder solventar los gastos de su familia se dedica a vender medicina natural y química, empieza sus labores de 8:a.m. a 4:00 p.m., no posee más ingresos que los que genera con su negocio.
Utilizará el crédito para comprar reconstituyentes, vitaminas, tés, laxantes, etc., para estar preparada a las solicitudes de sus clientes, espera tener nuevos clientes, aumentar sus ventas e incrementar sus ganancias con las cuales cumplirá sus compromisos familiares.
Sueña con tener un negocio más fortalecido para contar con los recursos que le faciliten las mejorías en su hogar.

loans.use: comprar reconstituyentes, vitaminas, tés, laxantes, etc

loans.name: Reina Isabel

texts.es:
Reina de 41 años de edad, estudio hasta segunda año en salud, está acompañada.  Ella vivió en argentina donde aprendió el trabajo de terapeuta,  luego se fue a buscar el sueño americano y trabajo durante 5 años siempre como terapeuta; posteriormente,   ha trabajado durante 3 años en la ciudad y por su forma de tratar a sus pacientes es muy reconocida en la comunidad tanto que vienen de otros lugares a ser tratados por ella, sus hijos un varón de 19 años quien esta recién graduado de bachiller y su hija de 9 años está en básica.

Su experiencia es de 8 años trabajando,  pero como terapeuta pero solo tiene 3 años de estar trabajando como propio este tipo de trabajo le ha generado mucho reconocimiento en la comunidad, aprendió en Argentina y como estudio medicina ella siente que su vocación es ayudar a los demás con sus masajes y tratamientos, el trabajo ella lo tiene en su casa es ahí donde llegan los clientes y sus horarios pues son de todo el día, ya que en el momento que el cliente llega ella lo atiende por ello casi no sale de su casa.

Con el crédito ella comprara dos máquinas para masajes,  ya que por el constante uso que ella les da se le han dañado y le son de mucha ayuda para ejercer su oficio y con el crédito podrá comprarlos y así seguir trabajando y dándoles a sus clientes la atención que ellos merecen.

En un futuro ella desea comprar un terreno y construir la casa que ella siempre ha soñado en un lugar donde sea un clima fresco, ya que donde ella es originaria es un clima caliente por estar cerca de la costa, quiere que sus hijos estudien una carrera universitaria, que su hijo mayor sea ingeniero civil y su hija sea doctora que son los deseos de sus hijos esto lo lograra trabajando muy duro y teniendo la fé en Dios para que él le ayude a salir adelante.

loans.use: para comprar dos máquinas para masajes.

loans.name: Maricela Abigail

texts.es:
Maricela, es soltera, no tiene hijos, vive en casa familiar, para apoyar con los gastos familiares y cubrir sus necesidades personales, inicio por cuenta propia la venta de ropa y variedad de fruta, su jornada es de 8:00 a.m. hasta las 4:00 p.m., ya tiene experiencia en administrar su negocio.
Efectuará la compra de ropa, surtida en colores, estilos y tallas, para  caballeros, damas y niños, con lo que tendrá mejores opciones de compra para sus clientes, espera tener mejores ventas, atraer nuevos clientes y mejorar su economía.
Anhela con ser propietaria de un negocio mucho más rentable para contar con la solvencia económica que le permita continuar ayudando a su familia.

loans.use: compra de ropa

loans.name: Agnes

texts.en:
Agnes is 29 years old and is married with two children. She earns her income through the sale of crops and livestock, and she receives a monthly wage as a Community Knowledge Worker (CKW). Community Knowledge Workers are trusted community members, who provide agricultural data and advice to rural farmers in their local area including information about the weather, market prices, crop diseases and agricultural tools. On her land, Agnes grows maize, beans, coffee, vegetables, Cassava, sweet potatoes and bananas. She also has cows, goats and chickens.

Agnes has served as a CKW for the last two years, and she looks forward to renewing her CKW contract for the next three years. 

As a CKW, she will use the materials in her business-in-a-box (smartphone, solar charging set, and weighing scale) to disseminate vital agricultural information to the other members of her village, which will help them to improve their crop yields and increase their incomes. With the additional money she will earn as a CKW, Agnes will increase her working capital in her business to earn extra income. Her biggest dream in life is to build a permanent house for her family and serve her community.

loans.use: To purchase a mobile phone, solar charging set and a weighing scale

loans.name: Norma

texts.es: Norma tiene 39 años, está casada con Edgar y tiene 3 hijos que viven junto a ella en una vivienda hecha de material noble en calidad de alquiler. Norma se dedica a la venta de desayunos. Desde entonces madruga todos los días ofreciendo a sus clientes un desayuno nutritivo a base de maca y quinua acompañado de los deliciosos sándwich que ella misma prepara. Edgar quien labora en el rubro de transporte la lleva hasta su puesto muy temprano siéndole de gran ayuda. Viajeros y conductores matutinos  están en su lista de clientes constantes ya que gracias a su carisma y buena atención ha logrado convertir su pequeño negocio en una buena fuente de ingreso. No obstante considera que madrugar todos los días la termina agotando en muchas ocasiones. Es el tercer préstamo que solicita a Kiva y se siente muy agradecida por la oportunidad que le brindan. Desea en esta oportunidad contar con 2,000 nuevos soles para adquirir insumos para la preparación de sus sándwich al por mayor esperando obtener precios bajos como pan, camotes , huevos y otros.

loans.use: Compra de pan, camotes, huevos, entre otros.

loans.name: Jose Nehemias

texts.es:
José, solicita un nuevo crédito para comprar un soldador, para continuar dando un buen servicio a sus clientes, pues que con el que contaba en su negocio se daño.
Con el préstamo anterior fortaleció su negocio, sus clientes aumentaron, cumplió con los pedidos pendientes, debido a la demanda que hoy en día tiene en su taller de estructuras metálicas y de sus servicios como albañil, sus ingresos son mayores con los cuales ha mejorado el estilo de vida familiar y ha cancelado sus deudas.

loans.use: comprar un soldador

loans.name: Holly

texts.en:
Holly is 31 years old and is married with three children. He earns his income through the sale of crops and livestock, and he receives a monthly wage as a Community Knowledge Worker (CKW). Community Knowledge Workers are trusted community members, who provide agricultural data and advice to rural farmers in their local area including information about the weather, market prices, crop diseases and agricultural tools. On his land Holly grows cassava,beans, coffee, vegetables and bananas. He also has goats and chickens.

Holly has served as a CKW for the last two years, and he looks forward to renewing his CKW contract for the next three years. 

As a CKW, he will use the materials in his business-in-a-box (smartphone, solar charging set, and weighing scale) to disseminate vital agricultural information to the other members of his village, which will help them to improve their crop yields and increase their incomes. With the additional money he will earn as a CKW, Holly will expand his farm by growing a wider range of crops and rear animals. His biggest dream in life is to become an exemplary farmer able to advise other farmers adopt better agricultural practices.

loans.use: To purchase a mobile phone, solar charging set and a weighing scale

loans.name: Keydi Julissa

texts.es: Keydi, tiene 22 años de edad, vive en unión libre con su esposo, con quien tiene dos hijos, reside en el municipio de Tocoa, Colon. Keydi lleva más de 3 años de dedicarse a su propio negocio de elaboración de pan, pizzas y encurtidos. Después de estudiar ella aprendió a elaborar estos productos que ahora vende y los hace en su casa. Esta solicitando un préstamo por 15,000 Lempiras para comprar insumos como harina, huevos, manteca, levadura, vegetales etc., y elaborar sus productos de pan, pizzas  y encurtidos para vender, con esta inversión ella piensa crecer y obtener más ganancias con el negocio. Su meta es lograr tener un local en el centro de la ciudad para vender más.

loans.use: Comprar insumos como harina, huevos, manteca, levadura, vegetales etc., y elaborar sus productos de pan, pizzas  y encurtidos para vender.

loans.name: Francisco

texts.es:
Francisco, es jefe de su hogar, vive con su familia integrada por su esposa y sus hijos, no posee ayuda del extranjero, aprendió de su familia a comercializar ganado y tener crianza de peces, además para obtener mejores ingresos instalo una tienda en su casa de habitación, lo apoyan su esposa y sus hijos para realizar dichas actividades.
Utilizará el capital para mejorar la infraestructura de las piscinas en donde tiene los peces y comprara ganado para luego venderlo a mejor precio, lo que le da oportunidad de fortalecer grandemente su negocio para luego obtener mejores ganancias cancelar sus cuotas y dar un mejor estilo de vida a su familia.
Aspira mejorar su economía para cancelar con rapidez la deuda y seguir mejorando su negocio.

loans.use: mejorar la infraestructura de las piscinas y comprara ganado

loans.name: Lydia

texts.en:
Lydia is 37 years old and is married with seven children. She earns her income through the sale of crops and livestock, and she receives a monthly wage as a Community Knowledge Worker (CKW). Community Knowledge Workers are trusted community members, who provide agricultural data and advice to rural farmers in their local area including information about the weather, market prices, crop diseases and agricultural tools. On her land Lydia grows maize, beans, coffee, vegetables cassava and bananas. She also has goats and chickens.

Lydia has served as a CKW for the last two years, and she looks forward to renewing her CKW contract for the next three years. 

As a CKW, she will use the materials in her business-in-a-box (smartphone, solar charging set, and weighing scale) to disseminate vital agricultural information to the other members of her village, which will help them to improve their crop yields and increase their incomes. With the additional money she will earn as a CKW, Lydia will meet school requirements for her children. Her biggest dream in life is to become a large scale farmer able to export her farm produce as opposed to selling them locally.

loans.use: To purchase a mobile phone, solar charging set and a weighing scale

loans.name: Hector Andres

texts.es: Don Hector, tiene 54 años de edad, esta casado, tiene dos hijos y reside en el municipio de Tocoa, Colon. El trabajo por varios años prestando el servicio de topografía. Hace 5 años decidió con su esposa establecer un negocio de pulpería donde vende productos de la canasta básica familiar, como ser frijoles, harina, pan, arroz, manteca, huevos, azúcar, churros, condimentos, productos de aseo, carnes, etc. El préstamo que solicita es por 15,000 Lempiras con el fin de surtir la pulpería de productos como manteca, harina, arroz, azúcar, productos de aseo, pan, huevos, churros, carnes, pastas etc. Y poder aumentar las ganancias. Su sueño es llegar a tener su negocio grande y en un local propio.

loans.use: Surtir la pulpería de productos como manteca, harina, arroz, azúcar, productos de aseo, pan, huevos, churros, carnes, pastas etc.

loans.name: Dativa

texts.en:
Dativa is 29 years old and is married with three children. She earns her income through the sale of crops and livestock, and she receives a monthly wage as a Community Knowledge Worker (CKW). Community Knowledge Workers are trusted community members, who provide agricultural data and advice to rural farmers in their local area including information about the weather, market prices, crop diseases and agricultural tools. On her land, Dativa grows beans, coffee, vegetables, avocado and bananas. She also has pigs, goats and chickens.

Dativa has served as a CKW for the last two years, and she looks forward to renewing her CKW contract for the next three years. 

As a CKW, she will use the materials in her business-in-a-box (smartphone, solar charging set, and weighing scale) to disseminate vital agricultural information to the other members of her village, which will help them to improve their crop yields and increase their incomes. With the additional money she will earn as a CKW, Dativa will buy high yielding seeds to increase on her agricultural output. Her biggest dream in life is to become a model farmer and free people in her community from poverty by helping them to adopt good agricultural practices.

loans.use: To purchase a mobile phone, solar charging set and a weighing scale

loans.name: Ana Cristina

texts.es:
Ana de 30 años de edad, estudio hasta octavo grado de educación, es madre soltera de 2 hijos  los cuales viven aun en casa de ella,  ambos estudian. 

Ella trabaja como empleada doméstica en una casa particular donde le pagan por su servicios, se ha dedicado a esta labor desde hace 9 años, es la forma en la que está sacando adelante a sus hijos, además de este trabajo ella tiene una pequeño negocio de venta de tortillas los fines de semana, lo que le genera un ingreso adicional antes de dedicarse a eso, ella era agricultora en pequeño pero es una actividad muy difícil y no le era suficiente para mantener a su familia y decide mejor  instalar un puesto de tortillas en el municipio más cercano de donde vive en el negocio, se involucra una hermana quien le ayuda. El horario de trabajo es de 7 horas al día.


El préstamo que esta solicitando, es para comprar maíz para seguir vendiendo tortillas, el préstamo le ayudara a tener la materia prima para la elaboración de las tortillas, esto vendrá a mejorar los ingresos de la familia y por tanto su calidad de vida al mejorar la dieta alimenticia de sus hijos, esto también ayudara a que su negocio  prospere pues tendrá lo necesario para seguir trabajando.


Los sueños de la cliente son muchos y le gustaría alcanzarlos todos, dice que con voluntad y trabajo lo lograra entre esos sueños están poner un negocio de venta de productos de primera necesidad y hacer una casa de un mejor material,  pues actualmente vive en una casa de barro.   Para su familia,  es que ellos estudien y se superen a través del estudio cosa que ella no lo logro por falta de dinero.

loans.use: para comprar maíz para seguir vendiendo tortillas.

loans.name: Gloria Zulema

texts.es: Gloria, tiene 41 años de edad, casada, tiene dos hijos, vive con su esposo en el municipio de la Esperanza Intibucá. Ella tiene aproximadamente 18 años de dedicarse al comercio, tiene un puesto de venta en un mercado local, donde vende ropa y zapatos de todo tipo para damas, caballeros y niños. Ha mantenido estable económicamente su negocio mediante la inversión de varios préstamos. El préstamo que solicita es por 15,000 lempiras, el cual lo invertirá en la compra de mercadería principalmente uniformes escolares y calzado, ya que es la temporada escolar y necesita tener producto. Su meta es siempre seguir creciendo con el negocio.

loans.use: Compra de calzado  y ropa escolar para vender en esta temporada.

loans.name: Claudia Damaris

texts.es:
Claudia, es casada, tiene dos hijos de 11 y 8 años de edad, como una forma de aportar a los gastos familiares por iniciativa propia fundo una tienda en su casa, la cual atiende desde las 6:00 a.m. hasta las 4:00 p.m., su facilidad es que puede estar pendiente de su familia y atender a sus clientes.
Comprará golosinas, bebidas, granos básicos, jabón, detergentes, azúcar, etc., con lo que tendrá lo necesario para cubrir las necesidades de sus clientes, espera mejorar sus ventas y tener mayores ganancias.
